mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CPN_CD AS cpnCd /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CPN_USE_HIST /* 쿠폰 사용 내역 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CPN.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CPN_USE_HIST /* 쿠폰 사용 내역 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CPN.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CPN_CD AS cpnCd /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.USER_ID AS userId /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CHANNEL_CD AS channelCd /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CPN_USE_HIST /* 쿠폰 사용 내역 */ ,EZC_CHANNEL_MNG /* 채널 */ ,EZC_CPN /* 쿠폰 */ ,EZC_RESERV_BASE /* 예약 기본 정보 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CPN_CD = EZC_CPN.CPN_CD AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = EZC_RESERV_BASE.RESERV_NUM AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.CHANNEL_CD = EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.CHANNEL_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CHANNEL_MNG.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CPN.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_RESERV_BASE.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CPN_CD = #{param.cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.USER_ID = #{param.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CHANNEL_CD = #{param.channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */
AND EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = #{param.reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
ORDER BY EZC_CPN_USE_HIST.CPN_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CPN_USE_HIST SET /* 쿠폰 사용 내역 */ MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CPN_USE_HIST /* 쿠폰 사용 내역 */ WHERE 1=1 AND CPN_CD = #{cpnCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 쿠폰 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND USER_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 회원 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND CHANNEL_CD = #{channelCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 채널 코드, VARCHAR2(10) */ AND RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
